projects.title: Vision-Based Planar Damage Segmentation & Laser Cladding Path Planning System
projects.description: Built a vision-based system for 2D planar damage segmentation and automatic laser cladding path planning, from camera image to ABB/FANUC robot code.

projects.title: MNIST-CNN
projects.description: Baseline CNN for handwritten digits with training/eval scripts, metrics, and a confusion matrix.
